mapper.select: select c.*, cp.club_id profile_club_id, original_filename, renamed_filename, cp.created_at profile_created_at from club c left join club_profile cp on c.club_id = cp.club_id where club_name like '%' || #{inputText} || '%' or category like '%' || #{inputText} || '%' or activity_area like '%' || #{inputText} || '%' and status = 'Y'

select * from club
where ${column} like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
order by created_at desc
